body:
I upvoted you even though I disagree because I think this is a topic that we should be talking/debating.  I think guys with your perspective are usually on the same side as I am (white-nationalist with traditional American cultural mindset). 

>(1) SINGLE good reason why women should ever be allowed to do sports without a man there to rub their faces in the fact that they will never be physically equal to men?

Knowing whether women are worth starting families with is most valuable when they are between the ages of 18-25.  So, I'm going to be specifically talking about women at the *amateur* level, whether it be college or Olympic.  Women at the "professional" level are usually butch man-haters in their 30s whose competition in the sports they compete in can't be used in the same way as a basis for fertility. 

Which brings me to my first point... the more likely they are to compete in sports, the more likely they are to be fertile.  This is just self-explanatory.  They're less likely to die of heart disease, more likely to have healthy offspring, etc. 

This is a bridge to my second point... the best women should breed with the best men so their offspring will be the best.  You can gauge a women's athletic peak around the time I stated earlier in my argument. In the age of "diversity," it's important to have the most athletic offspring because mystery meat people are encouraged to beat them, rape them, and take everything they worked for by force.  You need a healthy offspring that can fight back against the orcs, and the best way to do this is through breeding with the best women.  You won't know who the best women are without amateur womens' sports

My third point... amateur womens' sports are an environment where the best women can meet with the best men.  Don't believe me?  Look at interviews and rate of pregnancies for womens' Olympic athletes 9 months from the Olympics. It's also common sense.  Sports clubs in high school and college often intermingle with each other.

body:
Someday nerds are going to bring back the Neanderthal.  The scrawniest ones looked like Mr. Universe.  If they decide they want to play football, all our roided up homo sapians are going to be complaining like the women are now about having to compete with trannies.  

Women like to compete too.  I’ve never cared to watch them compete, but the audience shouldn’t affect the contest.  We have classes in boxing and racing and many other sports to level the playing field.  A woman should not have to match up against a man in a skirt.  It would be fair in auto racing... maybe darts.  Curling.  Skiing..Log rolling is physical but I’ll bet women could bury the trannies in that contest, they have better balance than men.  I don’t really give a shit about sports, so what do I know?

body:
> If a man in average or even shitty shape seriously attacks a woman who is "athletic" for a woman, and that woman fights back, she is fucking dead.

Not true, men definitely have a brute force advantage but a women can surpass it provided the man hasn't trained much himself (and 90% of men don't, nor do 97% of women), I've seen it. Even still the bigger reason would be confidence, which men do seem to have more of likely due to socialization, but in a panic fight or flight situation this could easily change. Plenty of small and weak people, including girls, could beat the shit out of me due to fear and lack of confidence on my part and have overpowered me multiple times in play fights. Even in cases where I'm physically stronger than them. If a woman is willing to punch a man in the face or kick him in the nuts and actually do some damage, he'll back off and get scared whether he's stronger or not. It's just usually assumed that girls are soft and fragile and submissive and won't seriously fight back, and unfortunately this is true most of the time. Assaults and fights aren't exactly like competitions, if the victim can fight back and harm them they're not going to risk it, and yes weaker people can still gravely hurt and kill stronger ones, and even overpower them sometimes with higher confidence.

parent.body:
> If a man in average or even shitty shape seriously attacks a woman who is "athletic" for a woman, and that woman fights back, she is fucking dead.

Not true, men definitely have a brute force advantage but a women can surpass it provided the man hasn't trained much himself (and 90% of men don't, nor do 97% of women), I've seen it. Even still the bigger reason would be confidence, which men do seem to have more of likely due to socialization, but in a panic fight or flight situation this could easily change. Plenty of small and weak people, including girls, could beat the shit out of me due to fear and lack of confidence on my part and have overpowered me multiple times in play fights. Even in cases where I'm physically stronger than them. If a woman is willing to punch a man in the face or kick him in the nuts and actually do some damage, he'll back off and get scared whether he's stronger or not. It's just usually assumed that girls are soft and fragile and submissive and won't seriously fight back, and unfortunately this is true most of the time. Assaults and fights aren't exactly like competitions, if the victim can fight back and harm them they're not going to risk it, and yes weaker people can still gravely hurt and kill stronger ones, and even overpower them sometimes with higher confidence.

body:
Like I said you're looking at the top challengers and treating this like it's a weight-lifting competition. For the vast majority of people women pose a bigger threat than either of them think.

And yes, women can throw man punches, they just tend to throw girl punches because they're soft and delicate. They're taught that they're not supposed to fight back or act strong and tough, ever, and girl punches reflect that thinking. They're afraid of actually doing anything serious. That's a mental problem. I know this because I and several other guys are afraid of getting physical ourselves, and our attitudes are much weaker than our bodies. We don't *let* the weaker ones overpower us, they actually, legitimately do. If you seriously think women pose no threat to men simply because they're weaker, you're going to have a serious wakeup call when you meet a confident woman and she punches you hard in the face. Then you'll be dazed or knocked out so your strength won't be there to help you and you'll be begging for her mercy. Her fist may be weaker than yours but it's still not good if it hits you. Same way a little car is much weaker and smaller than an SUV but if it rams into one it's still going to do some serious damage and probably total it. It's a fight and a battle, not a competition.
